sources.title: Civil War Saint | Full Movie | Civil War Drama
sources.description:
Civil War Saint - A family film about a wounded Civil War soldier who wakes up to find the war has ended and his rescuer is an unexpected friend God has sent, a Saint Bernard who saves him and shows him the path to home.  Along the way, this Saint Bernard proves to be more than a dog, but a Civil War Saint. Can this wounded soldier overcome the scars of war and learn to love again through this gift from God?
2022. Stars: Ashley Hays Wright, Cadence Wright, David Owen Wright
*Licensed from Bridgestone Multimedia Group. All rights reserved*
